articles.title: Scientists Found a Way to Communicate With People Who Are Asleep And Dreaming - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Scientists have identified a new phenomenon they describe as "interactive dreaming", where people experiencing deep sleep and lucid dreams are able to follow instructions, answer simple yes-or-no questions, and even solve basic mathematics problems.

articles.title: NASA's Perseverance rover gears up to land on Mars in 'seven minutes of terror' - ABC News
